duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver a positive customer experience by providing consultative services, taking orders, and coordinating activities in the store.
Demonstrate consultative behaviors to understand and meet each customer’s individualized needs in printing, signs, graphics, and shipping.
Operate and maintain a wide variety of equipment, move boxes and equipment, stock materials, manage the production queue and output, and manage retail supply.
Follow instructions of supervisors, assist other team members, and contribute to the training of store team members.
Ensure confidentiality of customer data and careful handling of documents, media, and packages.
Maintain a safe, clean, and orderly retail store, including cleaning, repairing, and stocking all retail store printing and shipping equipment and supplies.
Perform multiple tasks at the same time and operate with minimal supervision while adhering to all FedEx Office team member and retail store standards.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent education
